comments.body: This looks good @captainkerk. Thanks for the patience. Are you able to add integration tests for the module? https://github.com/ansible/community/blob/master/group-aws/integration.md#policy

Yeah, I can add those tests. However, I'll need to create a redshift cluster during the test setup, so these tests will be sloooow. 

Have you all have any thoughts or discussions on using [moto](https://github.com/spulec/moto) for integration tests?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@from ansible.modules.cloud.amazon import redshift_cross_region_snapshots as rcrs

mock_status_enabled = {
